title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama CLI and server that lets you run Llama 2, Code Llama, Mistral, Gemma, and other models locally with GPU acceleration.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, list, delete models via a simple async/sync client.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python library.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama as a local LLM for chains, agents, retrieval, tool-calling, etc.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Full-featured ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama: multi-model chats, file uploads, RAG, admin panel, dark/light themes.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin SDK for Ollama with Spring Boot starters; chat, generate, pull, list, delete, embeddings.

title: ollama-cli (rick/ollama-cli)
summary: Interactive TUI for Ollama written in Go: browse, search, download, chat, manage models from the terminal.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot proxy; VS Code extension plus language-server for autocomplete.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + LangChain; ingest PDFs, query via CLI or REST.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that chats, generates images, and moderates using any Ollama model.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama server + web UI on Kubernetes with GPU node-selector and autoscaling.

title: ollama.nvim
summary: Neovim plugin for inline code generation, refactoring, and chat using Ollama models; supports llama3-code.

title: ollama-express
summary: Express.js starter that exposes OpenAI-compatible endpoints backed by Ollama; includes chat, embeddings, tools.

title: ollama-terraform
summary: Terraform module to provision GPU-enabled AWS EC2 or GCP instance with Ollama server pre-installed.

title: ollama-swift
summary: Swift Package Manager library for iOS/macOS apps to chat with Ollama models via async/await.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app + REST API that wraps Ollama for multi-user chat history, rate-limit, and admin analytics.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async client for Ollama; generate, chat, pull, list, embeddings.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with support for .NET 6/7/8, ASP.NET Core integration, and Blazor demo.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that brings Ollama models into channels with slash commands, threads, and file context.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack 2.0 pipelines.
